page.name: main
page.script: var onlineMusicOverdueInfo = "在线音乐服务已到期" var onlineMusicOverdueDate = "2017-01-01到期" var OnlineMusicRenewTip = "温馨提醒:可在”智家365 App“，进入”我的“点击”MixPad“，选择”音乐“续费。"
